actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A resolution urging the President to resubmit to the Senate for ratification the Geneva Protocol of 1925 banning the first use of gas and bacteriological warfare.

summary.text: Makes it the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should resubmit to the Senate for ratification the Geneva Protocol of 1925 banning the first use of gas and bacteriological warfare.

titles.title: A resolution urging the President to resubmit to the Senate for ratification the Geneva Protocol of 1925 banning the first use of gas and bacteriological warfare.
